subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Women and Girls
Coaches and Managers
Swimming
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Petersen Lubow, an all-American in swimming at Springfield College, in 1989 became the first female athletic director at a United States military service academy.
snippet: Petersen Lubow, an all-American in swimming at Springfield College, in 1989 became the first female athletic director at a United States military service academy.
